Reference

tern-package

TLG creation functions

Compound Tables

These tables are often compound tables that are found in the GDSR templates.

t_summary()

Summarize an Object for Different Groups

t_summary(<data.frame>)

Variables Summary Table

t_summary_by()

Summarize an Object for Different Groups with by Variable

t_forest_rsp()

Response Table as used for Forest Plot

t_forest_tte()

Time-to-event Table as used for Forest Plot

t_rsp()

Response Table

t_tte()

Time to Event Table

t_events_per_term_id()

Basic Events Table

t_events_per_term_grade_id()

Events by Highest Grade Table

Compound Graphs

g_forest()

Create a Forest Plot based on a Table

g_km()

Kaplan-Meier Plot

g_waterfall()

Horizontal Waterfall Plot

Elementary Tables

These are tables that are often used in compound tables or graphs.

t_summary(<default>)

Return an rtable with a no Method Message

t_summary(<numeric>)

Summarize Numeric Variables

t_summary(<factor>)

Summarize Categorical Data

t_summary(<logical>)

Summarize Boolean Data

t_summary(<character>)

Summarize Character Data

t_summary(<Date>)

Summarize Date Data

t_coxph()

Proportional Hazards Regression Model Fit Summary Table

t_km()

Kaplan-Meier Fit Summary Table

t_max_grade_per_id()

Tabulate maximum grade per id by col_by

t_count_unique()

Count Unique Elements Per Cell

t_events_summary()

Summary table for events

tabulate_pairwise()

Calculate statistics Pairwise with reference level

Analysis Helper Functions

these functions are used by other functions to derive data.

arm()

Identity function to indicate specials in formulas

Graphs Helper Functions

these functions are useful to modify graphs

decorate_grob()

Add Titles, Footnotes, Page Number, and a Bounding Box to a Grid Grob

decorate_grob_factory()

Automatically updates page number

decorate_grob_set()

Decorate all a set of grobs and add the page numbering

split_text_grob()

Split Text According To Available Text Width

stack_grobs()

Stack multiple grobs

arrange_grobs()

Arrange multiple grobs

draw_grob()

Draw grob Draw grob on device page

Data Helper Functions

these functions are used by other functions to derive data

label()

Get label attribute

with_label()

Return an object with a label attribute

var_labels()

Get Label Attributes of Variables in a data.frame

`var_labels<-`()

Set Label Attributes of All Variables in a data.frame

var_relabel()

Copy and Change Variable Labels of a data.frame

var_labels_remove()

Remove Variable Labels of a data.frame

`keys<-`()

Set object keys

keys()

Get object keys

safe_join()

Safer join for tern

combine_levels()

Combine Factor Levels

drop_shared_variables()

Remove Shared Variables

reorder_to_match_id()

Return Ordered Dataset so that a set of variables match exactly

Non-exported Functions

the documentation for those unexported functions is useful for developers

argument_convention()

Dummy Function that Documents all Standard Arguments

lt_events_per_term_id_2()

List of Events Terms Tables

lt_events_per_term_grade_id_1()

List of Events Terms Tables By Highest Grade (One Level Term only)

lt_events_per_term_grade_id_2()

List of Events Terms Tables by Highest Grade
